collections.description: Classifies products into distinct groups based on shared characteristics or purposes, such as **Bikes**, **Accessories**, or **Apparel**. This categorization aids customers in navigating the product offerings and enhances the shopping experience by allowing for easier product discovery and filtering.

Represents the items available for sale in the e-commerce platform. It encompasses essential details about each product, including its **name**, **description**, **pricing**, and associations with **categories** and **suppliers**. This entity is crucial for managing inventory and facilitating sales transactions.

Tracks the inventory levels of each product. Contains information about the **quantity** of each product available for sale, **reorder levels**, and **warehouse locations**. This entity is vital for inventory management, ensuring that products are adequately stocked to meet customer demand and prevent stockouts.

Represents the vendors or manufacturers that provide products. Contains essential information about each supplier, including their **contact details** and the **products** they supply. This entity is important for managing supplier relationships, tracking product sourcing, and ensuring timely inventory replenishment.

buckets.name: Product management
buckets.description: Serves as a comprehensive framework for managing all aspects of products within the e-commerce system. This entity encompasses various components that facilitate the organization, tracking, and sale of products, ensuring a streamlined process from supplier management to customer sales.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: serves as the primary identifier for grouping related products. Examples include **Bikes**, **Accessories**, and **Apparel**.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A brief overview of the category, providing additional context and details about the types of products included. This attribute can help customers understand the category's focus and offerings.

Classifies products into distinct groups based on shared characteristics or purposes, such as **Bikes**, **Accessories**, or **Apparel**. This categorization aids customers in navigating the product offerings and enhances the shopping experience by allowing for easier product discovery and filtering.

properties.name: SKU
properties.description: A unique identifier assigned to each product for inventory management and tracking purposes. It helps differentiate products and streamline the ordering process.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the product or service as displayed to the customer.

properties.name: Category name
properties.description: References the category or product group to which this item belongs. This links to a separate Category entity that stores hierarchical or descriptive data about product categories.

properties.name: Supplier code
properties.description: References the unique code of the supplier who provides or manufactures the product. Ties to the Supplier entity, facilitating supplier relationship management and inventory tracking.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A longer text providing additional details about the product. May be omitted if product details are referenced externally.

Represents the items available for sale in the e-commerce platform. It encompasses essential details about each product, including its **name**, **description**, **pricing**, and associations with **categories** and **suppliers**. This entity is crucial for managing inventory and facilitating sales transactions.

properties.name: id
properties.description: A unique identifier assigned to each product for inventory management and tracking purposes. It helps differentiate products and streamline the ordering process.

properties.name: SKU
properties.description: A unique identifier assigned to each product for inventory management and tracking purposes. It helps differentiate products and streamline the ordering process.

properties.name: id
properties.description: A unique identifier assigned to each product for inventory management and tracking purposes. It helps differentiate products and streamline the ordering process.

properties.name: SKU
properties.description: A unique identifier assigned to each product for inventory management and tracking purposes. It helps differentiate products and streamline the ordering process.

properties.name: Currency
properties.description: Indicates the currency in which the product price is set.

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: The numeric value of the product’s price in the specified currency.

properties.name: Effective date
properties.description: The date or date/time from which the specified price becomes valid. Enables time-based pricing and helps maintain a historical record of price changes.

properties.name: Product SKU
properties.description: A unique identifier for the product in stock. Serves as a foreign key linking to the Product entity, ensuring that each stock record is associated with an existing product.

properties.name: Available quantity
properties.description: Represents the current quantity of the product available for sale. This value is essential for **inventory management**, helping to determine stock levels and facilitate order fulfillment.

properties.name: Minimum quantity for reorder
properties.description: Indicates the threshold quantity at which a reorder should be triggered. This helps prevent stockouts by ensuring that inventory is replenished in a timely manner when levels fall below a certain point.

properties.name: Warehouse
properties.description: A unique identifier for the product in stock. Serves as a foreign key linking to the Product entity, ensuring that each stock record is associated with an existing product.

Tracks the inventory levels of each product. Contains information about the **quantity** of each product available for sale, **reorder levels**, and **warehouse locations**. This entity is vital for inventory management, ensuring that products are adequately stocked to meet customer demand and prevent stockouts.

properties.name: Street
properties.description: Specifies the street name and number, providing detailed location information within a city or town.

properties.name: Postal code
properties.description: A numerical or alphanumeric code assigned to a geographic area to facilitate mail delivery and location identification.

properties.name: City
properties.description: Indicates the name of the city or town where the address is located, helping to define the broader geographic region.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the warehouse where the product is stored.

properties.name: Company code
properties.description: A unique code identifying the supplier company. This serves as the primary key for the Supplier entity, and may also be used as a foreign key to link to a broader Company entity or domain if one exists.

properties.name: Company name
properties.description: The official or registered name of the supplier company.

properties.name: Contact name
properties.description: The primary point of contact’s full name. This individual typically handles order-related queries, negotiations, or partnership details.

properties.name: email
properties.description: The main email address for communicating with the supplier. Should be validated to ensure correct formatting.

properties.name: Phone number
properties.description: The primary telephone or mobile number for reaching the supplier. Formats may vary by region; it is recommended to store this in a standardized format if possible.

properties.name: Address
properties.description: A unique code identifying the supplier company. This serves as the primary key for the Supplier entity, and may also be used as a foreign key to link to a broader Company entity or domain if one exists.

Represents the vendors or manufacturers that provide products. Contains essential information about each supplier, including their **contact details** and the **products** they supply. This entity is important for managing supplier relationships, tracking product sourcing, and ensuring timely inventory replenishment.

properties.name: Street
properties.description: Specifies the street name and number, providing detailed location information within a city or town.

properties.name: Postal code
properties.description: A numerical or alphanumeric code assigned to a geographic area to facilitate mail delivery and location identification.

properties.name: City
properties.description: Indicates the name of the city or town where the address is located, helping to define the broader geographic region.

properties.name: Product management
properties.description: Serves as a comprehensive framework for managing all aspects of products within the e-commerce system. This entity encompasses various components that facilitate the organization, tracking, and sale of products, ensuring a streamlined process from supplier management to customer sales.

decorativeSymbols.name: Disclaimer
decorativeSymbols.value:
This Oracle Model for Product Management is intended for illustration purposes only and provides a simplified representation of the product management process within a relational database.

While it captures essential entities and relationships, it does not encompass all potential complexities, or best practices that may be applicable in a comprehensive system implementation.

description:
This Oracle Model for Product Management is intended for illustration purposes only and provides a simplified representation of the product management process within a relational database.

While it captures essential entities and relationships, it does not encompass all potential complexities, or best practices that may be applicable in a comprehensive system implementation.
